description: Updates the order of localized enum `values` in an [AttributeLocalizedEnumType](ctp:api:type:AttributeLocalizedEnumType) AttributeDefinition. It can update an AttributeLocalizedEnumType AttributeDefinition or an [AttributeSetType](ctp:api:type:AttributeSetType) of AttributeLocalizedEnumType AttributeDefinition.
title: ProductTypeChangeLocalizedEnumValueOrderAction
